definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Ps 42:2) hart, stag, deer (Aram. id., 0aylo0, Ar. 0’iy=alun, As. ailu Dl:w, but dub., v. Hpt:BAS i. 170; Eth. hayal: = leader ? cf. [[איִל]])—´[[א]] abs. De 12:15 + 6 t.; pl. [[אַיׇּלִים]] Ct So 2:9 + 3 t.;—hart, stag, allowed as food De 12:15, De 12:22, De 15:22 (all ‖[[חְבִי]]); De 14:5; (‖[[חְבִי]], [[יַחְמוּר]] etc.); eaten in Sol.'s household 1Ki 5:3 (‖ as De 14:5); sim. of leaping Is 35:6; id. ´[[עׂפֶר הָא]] Ct So 2:9, So 2:17, So 8:14 (all ‖[[חְבִי]]); as in search of pasture, sim. of princes of Judah La 1:6; as longing for water, sim. of longing for ´[[י]] Ps 42:2.
